feature_name: Link routing cleanup and preview-only labels
scope_summary: Normalize old app entry links to the current preview URL, add missing clean redirects for hub/app-build variants, and update copy labels to consistently say preview instead of live app.

legal_and_regulatory.rationale: Changes reduce ambiguous route behavior and remove misleading live-app wording.
evidence: app-build page language now labels environment as preview/in-development
No policy, terms, or legal obligations changed

privacy_local_first_promise.rationale: No data collection or storage behavior changed.
evidence: Only static links/copy and redirect rules updated

medical_scope_and_claims.rationale: No medical claims were added or modified.

behavioral_science_alignment.rationale: Direct routes reduce cognitive load and confusion during navigation.
evidence: Guide and app-build CTA labels align with preview status

neurodivergence_research_alignment.rationale: Predictable, explicit routing and naming improves trust and wayfinding.

user_benefit_and_harm_check.rationale: Users hit fewer stale routes and less misleading language, with no feature loss.
evidence: Internal link checks pass for touched pages
No broken targets introduced by redirect updates

brand_voice_and_claims.rationale: Wording now stays accurate about preview status and avoids false promises.

accessibility_and_inclusion.rationale: Cleaner routes and consistent labels reduce unexpected context changes.
evidence: Fewer redirect hops from legacy app links

security_and_reliability.rationale: Only routing and content labels changed; no executable logic risk increase.
evidence: No new script runtime or dependency changes

monetization_and_dark_pattern_check.rationale: No pricing, checkout, or paywall changes.

ship_decision.conditions: Deploy and verify /app/* resolves to /hub/beta/, and check guide/app-build CTA text/routes are consistent with preview messaging.
